item.title: teaching
item.description: Hi In the summer term of 2021 (Apil-July), I’m teaching a Statistics course for MA students in Multilingualism at Universit√§t Konstanz. The course is taught online. You can find all of the video lecture material on Vimeo here If you are interested in tutorial and exercise material for the course (or extra resources), please do not hesitate to get in touch with me via e-mail Thanks Max
